Based on the user's preferences, I would recommend watching "Saving Private Ryan" (1998) directed by Steven Spielberg. The movie is based on real-life events during World War II and features an impressive cast including Tom Sizemore, John de Lancie, Barry Pepper, Vin Diesel, and Benedict Cumberbatch.

The movie follows a group of U.S. soldiers who go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

"Saving Private Ryan" is considered one of the greatest war movies ever made and has won numerous awards including Academy Awards for Best Picture, Best Director, and Best Adapted Screenplay; Golden Globe Awards for Best Motion Picture - Drama; and BAFTA Awards for Best Cinematography.
